originalText.text: I work near by n went on lunchtime, hoped to get an idea about alterations but tailor don't come in until 2pm. My lunch is over at 2pm.ðŸ˜¤.  I dropped off 2 coats and a jacket. When I came after 2pm for the alteration of my jacket and  I had leather coat that needed the belt hoop repaired. OMG the belt hoop was almost perfectly repaired, I cldn't see the the tore area.  I was very impressed.  But I had to remind her about the other coat that was just getting cleaned. It was not with my items. I saw it hanging connected with another order. The tailor needs to find a better place to work.

originalText.text: Never written a review before but felt I needed to warn the world NEVER to use this cleaner! Once I dropped off a dress with a red wine stain on a Monday and 4 days later the garment was returned to me uncleaned.  Apparently they wanted "approval" to wash a stained garment so that I didn't come back and blame THEM for the stain.  Why would i need to give them verbal approval to dry clean a garment I dropped off at a DRY CLEANER! What other reason would I have for dropping it off?  I am also unclear why it took them four days to return something they never planned to wash.  By that time, the stain had set in and the dress was ruined.  That is just one of the many horrible experiences I have had with them.  The list goes ON and ON...my fault for taking so long to switch I guess.

originalText.text: Their same day service is inhibited by their inability to take down credit card info accurately. The first time was cool. Here is my credit card info, log it for future use. The second time I needed bed sheets back and they screwed it up again. I literally walked in their with my card and told them to update the file. Couldn't figure it out. Next door I go.

originalText.text:
As bad as it gets. They will lose or ruin something once every month or two. You will inherit a stranger's article just as often. Particularly terrible with socks. Kiss those goodbye.

Oh, they also lost my wedding tuxedo. Good times.

originalText.text: I have an office upstairs and have lately started using them.  The staff is friendly and service has always been prompt so far.
